messages.subject: Re: Help Needed?
messages.snippet: I tried to grab time on your calendar. I'm in EST though and did not see a time that works for me. I'm curious if I provided all info could you or someone from your team assist in building it
messages.body: I tried to grab time on your calendar. I'm in EST though and did not see a time that works for me. I'm curious if I provided all info could you or someone from your team assist in building it out for me? I'm totally blind and struggle with a lot of technology as I use a screen reader. I'm a solo outbound sales consultant. I offer a full outsourced outbound sales motion. Targeting founder, co-founder, solo sales/marketing leader. MSP cyber security digital marketing agencies and martech companies. Seat size 11-50. Revenue $1M to $20M I'm very active on LinkedIn so would want to be able to view/connect/mesage prospects there as well. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated. Thanks, -- Martin MacArthur, The Outbound Sales Guy mobile +1 (613) 894-2800 [image: rtpx||8741198c-9088-4b63-b857-1d0bda7361a5] On Sat, Mar 1, 2025 at 12:46 PM Mert from GodmodeHQ <mert@troylabs.io> wrote: > Hey Martin - you have signed up for GMHQ > <https://c.vialoops.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fgodmodehq.com/1/0100019552d17aaf-a02a96f3-acf6-4e23-a968-0cd68835a0b9-000000/NXvjD1oWFbP7s-TtMpucUvmTufMo9Iv7akNn7fjLkMg=394> > a couple days back and I wanted to reach out to check if everything is > working for you. > How can we help out? What is your use case? Happy to help you to build it > out. > Here is my calendar > <https://c.vialoops.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fgtm.sale%2Fmeet/1/0100019552d17aaf-a02a96f3-acf6-4e23-a968-0cd68835a0b9-000000/jyO-AZSg1ECxGuZusTqK-GSlFdFznEKYRSb2T9f1NgA=394>. > We are very responsive. Please let us know how we can further help. > Founder > > > You are receiving this email because you opted-in to receive updates from > ✊ GodmodeHQ > ✊ GodmodeHQ, Unit 82a James Carter Road, Mildenhall, Bury St. Edmunds, > England, IP28 7DE > Unsubscribe > <https://c.vialoops.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fapp.loops.so%2Funsubscribe%2Fcm7qhv5y000rb0mlb3vx3h9c2%2Fcee867483d7333da260659469a7569ab2e3a48f1e24a5e1443176062f547e2b1/1/0100019552d17aaf-a02a96f3-acf6-4e23-a968-0cd68835a0b9-000000/OFKW6KEdbsBPx95lLCbn-10bz94kO2U4C6XLxokzMP8=394> >

I will be available friday afternoon EST. Ping me if you become available - otherwise I will follow up next week > > Thank you > > Best > > Mert > >> On 28 Jan 2025, at 19:56, Matt Tharp <matt@hunter.io> wrote: >> >> Hi Mert, >> >> Glad to hear the conversation was helpful! My schedule is a bit crazy this week, but I might be able to catch up friday afternoon EST. Can we play it by ear, and if nothing materializes this week we can catch up next week? >> >> Thanks >> Matt >> >> Matt Tharp | CEO @ Hunter.io | +1 617.631.0371 >> >> Sent via Superhuman <https://sprh.mn/?vip=matt@hunter.io> >> >> On Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 10:29 AM, Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io <mailto:mert@troylabs.io>> wrote: >>> Hey Matt - hope you and Hunter are doing well since our chat! Your advice was great and we are applying It (in terms of output based pricing) as we go. >>> >>> In the meantime, I am looking into our options going forward as a company if there are better moves in terms of M&A and further. >>> >>> I wanted to let you know and grab your mind if you know of anyone who might be interested or is already in the market. Confidential but I count on your discretion obviously. >>> >>> Would love to return the favour anytime. >>> >>> Best, >>> >>> Mert >>> >> >

messages.body: Well, that’s extremely kind of you, Mert. Our startup has a lot of skin in understanding what is and isn’t automated, and while some ref code in your email spiked it to the bot status, it couldn’t make a final decision. Semi-automated? messages.subject: Re: AppSumo Chat Follow-Up
messages.snippet: Hey Paul - can you clarify what you mean by Tier 1 pricing? Our pricing for the product starts at $250 and that sounds like a steep discount. We might not be on the same page regarding pricing Mert On
messages.body: Hey Paul - can you clarify what you mean by Tier 1 pricing? Our pricing for the product starts at $250 and that sounds like a steep discount. messages.subject: Re: AppSumo Chat Follow-Up
messages.snippet: Hey Mert, We are confirmed for April 14th. Please note that due to a store-wide initiative of increasing AOV, we are going to increase your Tier 1 price from $39 --> $59. Let's make sure to get
messages.body: Hey Mert, We are confirmed for April 14th. Please note that due to a store-wide initiative of increasing AOV, we are going to increase your Tier 1 price from $39 --> $59. Let's make sure to get those forms in by their deadlines and cheers to a great launch! Paul On Fri, Feb 28, 2025 at 8:51 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io> wrote: > Yes working on those forms. > > Let’s do 60 days > > On 28 Feb 2025, at 14:49, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: > > AND do you still want to launch for 30 days or the full 60 days? > > On Fri, Feb 28, 2025 at 8:46 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: > >> Amazing and y'all will be able to get those forms completed in the >> timeframe I mentioned? >> >> Paul >> >> On Fri, Feb 28, 2025 at 8:40 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io> wrote: >> >>> The intake form is now submitted! >>> >>> On 28 Feb 2025, at 14:19, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: >>> >>> I don't think so but I'll check with my team to see if there is anything >>> we could do to get in for April 7th. >>> >>> Either way, we need to get on the calendar today (requires everything >>> from my previous email) and then will need to submit the content form as >>> quickly as possible (nothing too crazy in there). >>> >>> Paul >>> >>> On Fri, Feb 28, 2025 at 8:11 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io> wrote: >>> >>>> Sure thing - anyway we can do before April 14th? >>>> >>>> Mert >>>> >>>> On 28 Feb 2025, at 14:05, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: >>>> >>>> Hey Mert, >>>> >>>> That's great to hear. >>>> >>>> Here's what I need from you: >>>> >>>> 1. messages.snippet: Thanks, I'm in the process of getting the launch date approved. Will you let me know the following: 1. Updated MRR 2. Updated monthly burn 3. Remaining funding from the $2.6m 4. Number of months of
messages.body: Thanks, I'm in the process of getting the launch date approved. Will you let me know the following: 1. Updated MRR 2. Updated monthly burn 3. Remaining funding from the $2.6m 4. Number of months of runway We just want to make sure y'all have the capacity to keep this operational for the next few years. Thanks! Either way, we need to get on the calendar today (requires everything from my previous email) and then will need to submit the content form as quickly as possible (nothing too crazy in there). messages.subject: Re: AppSumo Chat Follow-Up
messages.snippet: Sure thing - anyway we can do before April 14th? Mert On 28 Feb 2025, at 14:05, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: Hey Mert, That's great to hear. Here's what I need from you: 1.
messages.body: Sure thing - anyway we can do before April 14th? Mert > On 28 Feb 2025, at 14:05, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: > > Hey Mert, > > That's great to hear. > > Here's what I need from you: > > 1. Please submit our intake form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/Jl22-6qcW7lCdLW6lZ3lyW6ZwK-y1KCCmyW6Xybm48mzLbwVpmzK161M8ygW7S537T2QYjD2W7VlW_87HDN_jW8gy3hj49bNlmW8_fJ-f7V_CL6W20dhC96jtV3LW3WVFwN4CfT7dN7t16Cwn7lqrW6Swvmp4RsvY_W8z5qSb1V10LFW3ZmJB74WqMzrW5GkZSQ85J1CPW4Z7RrK8mPx4TW3sxQ1h1zYhcBW5-2hgH2zmyZbW2BRrh_1X-bV5W5b79bJ3QVhDzW3NXbwY2M8Z3kW4fpBXY3HbTx0W7yylq440-4m4W8_3m7P6hkScRW4wtVPy49tmtrf6StCs804> ASAP > 2. Confirm that April 14th will work for you as a launch date > 3. Confirm that you'll be able to complete the content form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3pqW8vv_GQ7_qCcbW7N_Ntq22HWtQW7fr6zt2JMSHSW74Lwpk1kNgl2W6yYNcg5J_2HFW7DSBNS2dphR5W1yNrZ75dBL_vW3W920j8BYDdvW3Hqk4f6_58K5W5Gmw806W1vcqW23N8dt1dfYh2W7F9nCW2h23tMW7y7bGP8mZrpPW6nKWPW8-L9HhN6bpD1HqbFFQW2N6PGM2SgMSVW6xdd5B7m0Nz8N9cJ9hfqh-B4W6-Mzfs8K06CjW8yzjt_5wSGtfW2p_h1144BBlpW49JnHY8XjPhqf6ybk_T04> in 1 week from today and the success form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3lyW6Xl1sh8LHShwW4STCSp4Y5_XtW5pYtG_7zHR5XW7sc_mj3pppjwW1tFbNj5PCm2sN3Z85SHGlz6fW4jnz951Qzfj7W6T39p46hhXQfW3rTcPq69kl6XW7Ykhz47qzVFkN830vFBC4XhDVTBjwn5HRWrWW4B_2Vc5BGQ_TW2rN-pT5DfYlrW40DHT821g9VvVlPjTv7hV99DW5H2L1X8ycmyyW3Cp-VS7pDQB8N7LK3kQCJXXPW81Bydg7Zl6jxW160chw2gWNpJVJDb2c5bQWLyf6hccR-04> 2 weeks from today. > > Looking forward to getting y'all launched! > > Paul > > On Fri, Feb 28, 2025 at 6:10 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io <mailto:mert@troylabs.io>> wrote: >> Hi Paul - sorry for the radio silence here - we can commit for a launch now as soon as you are available. Can you outline the steps we need to complete and when we can launch? >> >> Mert >> >>> On 3 Feb 2025, at 23:17, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>> >>> Mert, >>> >>> Last we left it you could commit to a launch date end of February. Just want to clarify - are you hoping to launch at the end of Feb or would you like to check back at that time to set a launch date? >>> >>> Paul >>> >>> On Fri, Jan 31, 2025 at 11:50 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>> Hey guys, >>>> >>>> Do you have a few min to chat on Monday? >>>> >>>> I want to get on the same page about our launch date. >>>> >>>> Throw out some available time and I'll make it work. >>>> >>>> Paul >>>> >>>> On Tue, Jan 21, 2025 at 2:06 PM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>> Mert, >>>>> >>>>> In order for me to secure a launch date it needs to be 45 days in advance and I need a commitment from your team that you'll be able to complete our content form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3kqW1d0rB783CD3CMHGTqcxVvMqW8tvx3r5KNNYXW27l1vK1xlTKvW6PLHqY8QxG6ZW32Fq4T8clb9rW1PmWMc1s7tDcN1r_FtzMPdldW50cNrG2YhZ-gW4rZ03818HdJTN4lTSJXzPnVvW5v2MR37RjWCHW2XlNvf20Pzw7W3rwhnD6LBZssVts7S128JjdsW3L4Rzc6pFHnCW2wjGy34pkR-KW6-bH4j3xXyhBN37jS_RMFBmzN7FJftP2fXTwW8wWzth63WzsBW7jK8Qj2vrvHMf7WFCBK04> within 1 week and our success form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3kPN49kvWTRnmNlW8dRKCm6Ck2JrW8TXtvJ78Y51CW7mQkvr4chhLdW4yQ_6q83LhJmN5M093dKSq9KN5F76HCmwSMzW8QNd1r1FkCnsW6W0BxN5_1DZpN2mnTttVRpPkW1D8G5w2zydzPW4G0cmh1xRNYjW7BVXSF5GqWzYW3xbldp6dNsxXW5BN6M48tGs_-VhfGVk1lj_RNW4DdSl42sKLbQW4ldN097LCGXnW7tzhN06n9YLqW2mZ7Nr1sHqXnW5w2XLY7jXhrNW1nKjDt3sycL0f456L1T04> within 2 weeks. >>>>> >>>>> We're currently scheduling launch dates for March 3rd so if your goal is to launch by then I'd need you to commit to getting those forms completed within those deadlines then I'll be able to secure our launch date. >>>>> >>>>> What do you think? >>>>> >>>>> Paul >>>>> >>>>> On Tue, Jan 21, 2025 at 11:49 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io <mailto:mert@troylabs.io>> wrote: >>>>>> Hey Paul - end February would be good >>>>>> >>>>>>> On 21 Jan 2025, at 16:57, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>> >>>>>>> Thanks for letting me know, Mert. >>>>>>> >>>>>>> When do you anticipate you could commit to a launch date? >>>>>>> >>>>>>> On Tue, Jan 21, 2025 at 10:15 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io <mailto:mert@troylabs.io>> wrote: >>>>>>>> Hey Paul.- we need more time here >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> On 21 Jan 2025, at 15:54, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> Checking-in on this. >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> Everything okay? messages.subject: Re: AppSumo Chat Follow-Up
messages.snippet: Hi Paul - sorry for the radio silence here - we can commit for a launch now as soon as you are available. Can you outline the steps we need to complete and when we can launch? Mert On 3 Feb 2025, at 23
messages.body: Hi Paul - sorry for the radio silence here - we can commit for a launch now as soon as you are available. Can you outline the steps we need to complete and when we can launch? Mert > On 3 Feb 2025, at 23:17, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com> wrote: > > Mert, > > Last we left it you could commit to a launch date end of February. Just want to clarify - are you hoping to launch at the end of Feb or would you like to check back at that time to set a launch date? > > Paul > > On Fri, Jan 31, 2025 at 11:50 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >> Hey guys, >> >> Do you have a few min to chat on Monday? >> >> I want to get on the same page about our launch date. >> >> Throw out some available time and I'll make it work. >> >> Paul >> >> On Tue, Jan 21, 2025 at 2:06 PM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>> Mert, >>> >>> In order for me to secure a launch date it needs to be 45 days in advance and I need a commitment from your team that you'll be able to complete our content form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3kqW1d0rB783CD3CMHGTqcxVvMqW8tvx3r5KNNYXW27l1vK1xlTKvW6PLHqY8QxG6ZW32Fq4T8clb9rW1PmWMc1s7tDcN1r_FtzMPdldW50cNrG2YhZ-gW4rZ03818HdJTN4lTSJXzPnVvW5v2MR37RjWCHW2XlNvf20Pzw7W3rwhnD6LBZssVts7S128JjdsW3L4Rzc6pFHnCW2wjGy34pkR-KW6-bH4j3xXyhBN37jS_RMFBmzN7FJftP2fXTwW8wWzth63WzsBW7jK8Qj2vrvHMf7WFCBK04> within 1 week and our success form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3kPN49kvWTRnmNlW8dRKCm6Ck2JrW8TXtvJ78Y51CW7mQkvr4chhLdW4yQ_6q83LhJmN5M093dKSq9KN5F76HCmwSMzW8QNd1r1FkCnsW6W0BxN5_1DZpN2mnTttVRpPkW1D8G5w2zydzPW4G0cmh1xRNYjW7BVXSF5GqWzYW3xbldp6dNsxXW5BN6M48tGs_-VhfGVk1lj_RNW4DdSl42sKLbQW4ldN097LCGXnW7tzhN06n9YLqW2mZ7Nr1sHqXnW5w2XLY7jXhrNW1nKjDt3sycL0f456L1T04> within 2 weeks. >>> >>> We're currently scheduling launch dates for March 3rd so if your goal is to launch by then I'd need you to commit to getting those forms completed within those deadlines then I'll be able to secure our launch date. >>> >>> What do you think? >>> >>> Paul >>> >>> On Tue, Jan 21, 2025 at 11:49 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io <mailto:mert@troylabs.io>> wrote: >>>> Hey Paul - end February would be good >>>> >>>>> On 21 Jan 2025, at 16:57, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>> >>>>> Thanks for letting me know, Mert. >>>>> >>>>> When do you anticipate you could commit to a launch date? >>>>> >>>>> On Tue, Jan 21, 2025 at 10:15 AM Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io <mailto:mert@troylabs.io>> wrote: >>>>>> Hey Paul.- we need more time here >>>>>> >>>>>>> On 21 Jan 2025, at 15:54, Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>> >>>>>>> Checking-in on this. >>>>>>> >>>>>>> Everything okay? Haven't heard from y'all in a while. >>>>>>> >>>>>>> Paul >>>>>>> >>>>>>> On Fri, Jan 17, 2025 at 12:59 PM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>> Hey guys, >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> Following-up on this one. >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> A launch date of Feb. 24th is no longer available and we're now looking at Mar. 3rd. >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> What do you think? Can we commit to this date? >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> Paul >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> >>>>>>>> On Tue, Jan 14, 2025 at 9:27 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>> Hussein and Mert, >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> Wanted to loop us all in together here to make some progress on this launch. >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> Are y'all good to go for a February 24th launch? If so, please confirm that you'll be able to complete the content form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3pLN36D4fGSZTNKW4Z9_r23W-3N9W8c_C7z2XWZ6qW5Qtky83MrzjsW9g1SSp2_r4ykW3S9dwQ6xw2KcW73LdVJ5zggT-W4l0v9x5yFZW0W4zDP_P1n0d8-W3WRNSm2RBkHgW1g1GVt7JWFrQVnbNHW1snLW3W4hWtQy67v6Y5W7RC-mT5MfsDxW3xlRV_5p3rGKW1xptLt7-G0lJN98k57BSqVxQW4zKthY6sSVBdW3SY54g8G62lJW5GsxXr5TKZDrW8BRm7Z3cvqR3W3zl77_87GJVdf10Cr3204> within 1 week from today and the success form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3pxW37Yw-97SrPcPW2f_bfj4clTmLW9jnQ2q91STl6W8p5sp35h2FdSVLmxTj71ND5JW5LbH0b40wlV3W4Byhr15qr2NKW24ZqD28mtHBRW5Q_Ry58qSNNmW27n4fv8J94xNW5KpnDB3xR4zBW5pBZ1q4FH_pnW7n6qD64D0MDcW2QkBVr93xVVQW1qMSX56LnhhqW3_Stz_898R8cW6_Xbvy5xM4_FW5p8mHt2dlKfzW8Mr4D896qQVFW7pF66p6mcJDPVJnwyj8fZN-tW3p4jPr1S8svHf8rf7dn04> within 2 weeks from today. These are super important deadlines and we would ultimately lose our launch date if we cannot complete them within the deadlines provided. >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> Let's get this moving again! >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> Paul >>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>> On Wed, Jan 8, 2025 at 9:53 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>>> Bumping this! Happy to chat for a few min over whatsapp call if that's easier. >>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>> Let me know. >>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>> Paul >>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>> On Tue, Jan 7, 2025 at 9:49 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>>>> Hey Hussein, >>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>> I sent you a couple of messages on WhatsApp yesterday, but perhaps this is a better place to communicate. >>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>> We have an opening for February 18th to launch. If this works for you, please confirm that you'll be able to complete the content form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3kWW7YmxKD6CDnGMW1yZ2RY78xp4jVRBrBd6X74y-W6RgXzM2QTz2KW551h-45PWw42W3bvYFs5Jfkq0W9crNk67WTL4VW1yPbzs4N1kd-W2srl6-9k0GvkW73Zplt7RBHFXW294FsQ40FRDgVYDq1S3R1CK7W8Mvlhq13sZMYW1L5ZCR94mQ21VvgRS58wV1t9W82LnKn9b7yt1W6YB24x4-sMxTW2s-BRS6p9FtzW7N78CF3ch0qWW7XCn_P6wRXwWW3F0LdQ1GX1CGW1D0Dwh86CK3pdWmsfv04> within 1 week from today and the success form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3ldW8JG_PQ1G2wp2W4_1ZKL3M1RX5W7j7mRb252VRrW3VcrqK2b_TSMN7YwxN4yvWdjW4M0P534QSRXqW3MQ2Jj6bw_WXW3hFr7h7KR6sbW7phYcJ9hyzVJW80tpMp3K3CMyW8gktcH2QdrgrW6Vv8Hv7yqw3sW3yG7kS3lv1vRW6fWS5M7P0K8KW31WGVc4GVw2dW478_vQ1pqcjRW1mNTkL6Rn7thW1lsbBP2QdpYdW6pNgWg4Sd4PrW6JRXGy4gswdzW6Rqnn82KH_w_N4YMYCmN8V_xf77jjbn04> within 2 weeks from today. These are super important deadlines and we would ultimately lose our launch date if we cannot complete them within the deadlines provided. >>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>> Let me know ASAP so I can get us on the calendar! >>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>> Paul >>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>> On Fri, Jan 3, 2025 at 1:24 PM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>>>>> Here are the test accounts to upgrade! >>>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>>> evcvltd@gmail.com <mailto:evcvltd@gmail.com> >>>>>>>>>>>> betaling@digitalfastmail.com <mailto:betaling@digitalfastmail.com> >>>>>>>>>>>> betalingtester2@gmail.com <mailto:betalingtester2@gmail.com> >>>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>>> On Wed, Dec 18, 2024 at 8:52 AM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>>>>>> Hey Hussein, >>>>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>>>> Super important we get those test accounts set up ASAP. >>>>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>>>> Any reason we can't get them today? >>>>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>>>> Thanks, >>>>>>>>>>>>> Paul >>>>>>>>>>>>> >>>>>>>>>>>>> On Wed, Dec 11, 2024 at 2:58 PM Paul Munguia <pmunguia@appsumo.com <mailto:pmunguia@appsumo.com>> wrote: >>>>>>>>>>>>>> Thanks, man! messages.subject: Re: AppSumo Onboarding Details | GodmodeHQ 🌮
messages.snippet: Hey team 1. Completed persona verification 2. Joined Slack 3. Completed company form 4. Comleted the content form 5. We will start looking into the oath and API integration Anything else pending? Mert
messages.body: Hey team 1. Completed persona verification 2. Joined Slack 3. Completed company form 4. Comleted the content form 5. We will start looking into the oath and API integration Anything else pending? Mert > On 28 Feb 2025, at 21:57, Patrick Morgan <patrick@appsumo.com> wrote: > > Hey Mert and team, > > Welcome to AppSumo, we're so excited to be partnering with you! I'm Patrick, your Launch Operations Specialist who will be guiding you through the onboarding process. > > I’ve compiled a list of action Items and important deadlines so you can begin scoping the work with your team(s) - the countdown to your launch begins now! > > > 💥 TOP PRIORITY action item (due tomorrow 3/1/25) > Complete Persona verification (Know Your Business & Know Your Customer) - Complete the required partner verification process by clicking the link below. Passing this verification is necessary to secure a Persona Verified badge in the "From the founders" section of your AppSumo Product Detail Page. This badge is critical for building customer trust and enhancing your brand's credibility. > > https://withpersona.com/verify?inquiry-id=inq_pYvBXEF1SR2Ypz6Z6Y6KKRFnGNdd > > Other action items (to be completed this week) > Accept Freedcamp invitations - All of your participating team members accept the Freedcamp invitations that were sent (this is our online onboarding portal). > > Here is your direct link to Freedcamp → https://freedcamp.com/view/3560008/tasks > <https://freedcamp.com/view/3560008/tasks> > Then click on “Projects” & review all tasks - ensure your team is prepared to meet the provided deadlines. > > Accept your AppSumo Slack channel invitations > > All AppSumo teams can be reached via Slack. During your onboarding, you'll receive a few automated email reminders, but Slack will be our main method of communication moving forward. > > Review the AppSumo Content + Success - Licensing Form due dates below > > > ❗ IMPORTANT: Once your team has joined Freedcamp, accepted Slack invitations, and reviewed the deadlines below, please confirm receipt by replying to this email with a quick confirmation. > ⭐️ When replying, please click “Reply All” to ensure everyone stays on the chain. > > 📆 Mission Critical Upcoming Deadlines: > Due: 3/7/25 - 1 week from today. AppSumo Content Form <https://d2rq2q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3ncW2YTRGJ7JdNNWW4jDXl15gWfQPW45hxcx3R_1R8W9gy68y7BmmSLW2XV1-g1HyCRsW53rCWQ5VhpMGW17rgcP7k1FSpW7bz3jV3H4q9MW2VqlLd9lfkzVW84krM03nmchRN5XzXX1rShYwW1MKzvQ1jshWxW4fmLpb2vZnTpW2b0HK05MFH9ZW6J42QN60sdZxN6yVSLzfjRtRW8YwGgR4nQ17QW5yxx7N8H4hf6W6KMkTh7_bSqGW24cwBG5_K0hSW4wDqB_8-W2rcW79pNTG3zZlssf1wclr604> due date. This includes graphics, logos, and a product demo video. > > Our Branding Guide will be located in Freedcamp for reference. Reach out to your dedicated Content Channel in Slack for assistance > Due: 3/14/25 - 2 weeks from today. messages.subject: AppSumo Onboarding Details | GodmodeHQ 🌮
messages.snippet: Hey Mert and team, Welcome to AppSumo, we're so excited to be partnering with you! I'm Patrick, your Launch Operations Specialist who will be guiding you through the onboarding process. I'
messages.body: Hey Mert and team, Welcome to AppSumo, we're so excited to be partnering with you! I'm Patrick, your Launch Operations Specialist who will be guiding you through the onboarding process. I’ve compiled a list of *action Items* and *important deadlines* so you can begin scoping the work with your team(s) - * the countdown to your launch begins now!* 💥 *TOP PRIORITY action item (due tomorrow 3/1/25*) 1. *Complete Persona verification (Know Your Business & Know Your Customer)* - Complete the required partner verification process by clicking the link below. Passing this verification is necessary to secure a Persona Verified badge in the "From the founders" section of your AppSumo Product Detail Page. This badge is critical for building customer trust and enhancing your brand's credibility. * https://withpersona.com/verify?inquiry-id=inq_pYvBXEF1SR2Ypz6Z6Y6KKRFnGNdd <https://withpersona.com/verify?inquiry-id=inq_pYvBXEF1SR2Ypz6Z6Y6KKRFnGNdd>* * Other action items **(to be completed this week*) 1. *Accept Freedcamp invitations* - All of your participating team members accept the Freedcamp invitations that were sent (this is our online onboarding portal). 1. Here is your direct link to Freedcamp → *https://freedcamp.com/view/3560008/tasks* <https://freedcamp.com/view/3560008/tasks> 2. Then click on “Projects” & review all tasks - ensure your team is prepared to meet the provided deadlines. 2. *Accept your AppSumo Slack channel invitations * 1. All AppSumo teams can be reached via Slack. During your onboarding, you'll receive a few automated email reminders, but Slack will be our main method of communication moving forward. 3. *Review the AppSumo Content + Success - Licensing Form due dates below * 4. ❗* IMPORTANT:* Once your team has joined Freedcamp, accepted Slack invitations, and reviewed the deadlines below, *please confirm receipt by replying to this email with a quick confirmation.* - ⭐️ When replying, please click “*Reply All*” to ensure everyone stays on the chain. *📆 Mission Critical Upcoming Deadlines:* - *Due: 3/7/25 *- 1 week from today. *AppSumo Content Form* <https://d2rq2Q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3ncW2YTRGJ7JdNNWW4jDXl15gWfQPW45hxcx3R_1R8W9gy68y7BmmSLW2XV1-g1HyCRsW53rCWQ5VhpMGW17rgcP7k1FSpW7bz3jV3H4q9MW2VqlLd9lfkzVW84krM03nmchRN5XzXX1rShYwW1MKzvQ1jshWxW4fmLpb2vZnTpW2b0HK05MFH9ZW6J42QN60sdZxN6yVSLzfjRtRW8YwGgR4nQ17QW5yxx7N8H4hf6W6KMkTh7_bSqGW24cwBG5_K0hSW4wDqB_8-W2rcW79pNTG3zZlssf1wclr604> due date. *This includes graphics, logos, and a product demo video. * - Our Branding Guide will be located in Freedcamp for reference. Reach out to your dedicated Content Channel in Slack for assistance - *Due: 3/14/25 *- 2 weeks from today. *AppSumo Success - Licensing V2 <https://d2rq2Q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3lfN96cyXcnWFJ2F45tSq8kM_WW80WfR811JHmZW5TxzM65y4VQrW2FrMhw313ypYW37x6KY5BGrpSW7kNyC73Y-K51Vx37vt8sXp8dW8WfF9S5C67Q7W4y4KCY42671VW3KC9F22NFFmmW8BQNk02CdrfCW6v-fdB2f8ds5W8WXjYZ3XJDHPW45BhSN2qN6KkW9gcVDc9lppjmN1qY0TF_xBfTW6rrf9162Kn05W96rD3G1WF4bRW46k8Lj1HvRBXW8LFb0F5xXly0N4DNCClVtMq7f8Tmbp204> *Form due date. - *This includes your fully completed and tested OAuth + Webhooks implementation. * - Here is our *AppSumo's OAuth + Webhooks guide* <https://d2rq2Q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3m-W8wC1yc4_K-HzW1m3V0V4s8gLsVTlmnY39mhfbW7dXdTG5LxH-LW5skGs61CNvS7W2BxDV82rc6zsN2c_TDSn05gDW4XvPwT1mJSNzW628m6M86Dj-cW2VCkjy7WCPZXN8g6HbpH0CknW8ZMtBL7k83VwW7CcQkN4dvFlNW5z-LDw1CcN74Vrc5Gg59zNyFW5kfsZP3b9QDTW3j1cHT4YyZyrW21HQW73mYmphN6jblJs27TttW2TfcsG7KmN7RW4fSh-q2dljsjW90TNsT5Z2MzHf4JnTFR04>. Reach out to your dedicated Launch Channel in Slack for assistance. 1. *For your Developers* → *Where do I locate my OAuth + Webhook configuration?* (*Click me to see an example* <https://d2rq2Q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3m-N6NnpX-_n8YgW31-cqc5XlSv7W15P1l46sFz21W1jsmdY31BcCXW1y5nmk6tngQHW4HNh1R9k-Z4rN3N48V7ZlS49N3RZGYVFFMWgW1Xv7qN5FXzvvW3zn3VB16Zr2CW6VdHJP4kQphwW3Tc2z79jhFSKW8fXFQ28l7q8kW7nflkl4PL9tlW2Vg3ht4n65WNW2nsn3R1SG0q6W3Xmgp94V5KvhN6nt_gwWGQyCW96zhRb294VdSW63THNq6kYH4YW7gPsZp8N7P59W15zjTd6H-sJwf2vZ-z-04> ) 2. *For your Developers* → *Required* | Displaying a user's AppSumo Tier information within the user's product dashboard (*Click me to see an example* <https://d2rq2Q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3n1W8SBhXp3ktbhKW79g6sX4vw1PJW6PH9R03tTsLgN3CY7t7GGxXFN4gtbbWD7nVXW6rwr0y6lG61lW8QkvL_7CQLsfW34K9Rg6Yzp8YW8Tg6sS25wZgdW8HPrw692TbsFW5PPSyb4YcQlXN66YjJsFGXTSVm0q9Y2BNJw5W4Gk6FN3WlR1DW25mqRj55BXMzW3JmXJ43L06s7Vm0VFb2c0zWrW64WBFk3CjKw7N6d5V53RX0KMW7K6KYz5Md7DZW7_-vWV5mJ65qW6-cP-h5Z7r74f8Kds0C04> ) 3. *For your Developers* → *Optional* | Co-branded landing page with AppSumo branding (*Click me to see an example* <https://d2rq2Q04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/W3+23284/d2rq2Q04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3lMW7R_KBq2RTy_qW6-YRBh4ykRZFW6p_Czy4gcpTGW4CCJMQ2dHY0xM4K4fn4Q9X2VV7c6z6V4z8gW8FDF_95FRcjkW5hhJhR2z6t8gW1Wdh224tTDZZN3fS7G5XW-19W8Jr6z67VRVL8W6sThlJ2g2m3mVTqMg0418L8RW6x0r2v2QGdMmW3Qn9vt1wsTqJW4-cSp75F4PDWW5QTRym8MpBd5W77hR3418Ql2tW88-gf91CGljGN32LKK0XntR8W8N9jyw43htFHN8lxGPXMHvZtf5QkqyF04> ) - *4/14/25 *- AppSumo Launch Date! 🍾 - *🚨 Submitting the above forms on or before the listed due dates is critical to the success of your launch! Please let us know as soon as possible if you have concerns with these deadlines. We’re happy to assist. * ------------------------------ *👉 Friendly reminder to click “Reply all” when sending your Day 1 onboarding confirmation.* Looking forward to a successful launch! threads.subject: Re: Acrew Capital - PFIC/CFC Request for 2024 Tax Filing - Troy Guild

messages.subject: Re: Acrew Capital - PFIC/CFC Request for 2024 Tax Filing - Troy Guild
messages.snippet: Hi Carli, Hope you're doing well. We know you are still working on the PFIC assessment, however in the interim would you be able to share a detailed 2024 balance sheet, income statement, and cap
messages.body: Hi Carli, Hope you're doing well. We know you are still working on the PFIC assessment, however in the interim would you be able to share a detailed 2024 balance sheet, income statement, and cap table? Thanks very much in advance. Best regards, Mark On Thu, Feb 20, 2025 at 10:32 AM Mark Braisted <mbraisted@acrewcapital.com> wrote: > Thanks for the update Carli! If helpful for when the time comes, please > see the blank PFIC information statement that I had referenced in my > initial email. > > On Wed, Feb 19, 2025 at 1:04 AM Carli Niemann <carli@troylabs.io> wrote: > >> Hi Mark, >> >> >> >> Thank you for reaching out. >> >> >> >> We are currently preparing this information and will provide it as soon >> as possible. >> >> >> >> Many thanks, >> >> Carli >> >> >> >> *From: *Mark Braisted <mbraisted@acrewcapital.com> >> *Date: *Saturday 15 February 2025 at 00:08 >> *To: *Carli Niemann <carli@troylabs.io> >> *Cc: *Acrew Finance <finance@acrewcapital.com> >> *Subject: *Acrew Capital - PFIC/CFC Request for 2024 Tax Filing - Troy >> Guild >> >> >> >> Hi Carli, >> >> >> >> As Acrew Capital is an US investor, the investing Acrew entities have >> annual tax filing requirements for its foreign investments. To assist with >> this filing, Acrew would like to request either of the following: >> >> >> >> 1. If your company has performed its annual PFIC or CFC assessment, >> please advise if the company is considered a PFIC or CFC and if yes, please >> provide a copy of your existing PFIC or CFC Annual Information Statement. >> We've also attached our own blank version of the information statement if >> you would prefer to fill it out. *or* >> >> >> >> 2. If the PFIC or CFC assessment has not been made, please provide: >> >> · Your company's 2024 financials (balance sheet & income statement) >> >> · Detailed investor cap table as of 12/31/24 >> >> · Entity organizational chart >> >> · Entity board composition, with country of residence for each member >> >> If you can provide this information before *February 21st*, it would be >> greatly appreciated. >> >> >> >> Best regards, >> >> Mark Braisted >> >

messages.to: Carli Niemann <carli@troylabs.io>, Naheeda Begum <naheeda@millet.org.uk>, Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io>
messages.snippet: Hi Carli Hope you are doing well. Thank you for your email. I just wanted to clarify the reason behind the request for contractor's email ID. On the balance sheet , the payment to contractors
messages.body: Hi Carli Hope you are doing well. Thank you for your email. I just wanted to clarify the reason behind the request for contractor's email ID. On the balance sheet , the payment to contractors appears as a payable (for the last month). To confirm the same , we generally send an email to the contractor/employee to confirm the payable. Further , it is a general audit procedure in order to confirm the existence of the employees/contractors. Please do let me know in case of any issues Thank you and Warm regards , Snehil Kulshreshtha Audit Senior Registered Auditors. Independent Examiners. [A blue text on a white background Description automatically generated] Beyond Aldgate Tower, 2 Leman St, London E1 8FA andrew@millet.org.uk<mailto:andrew@millet.org.uk> 0203 084 4550 www.millet.org.uk Millet is the trading name for Millet Accountants Ltd. Registered in England & Wales, Company number 07950802. A firm of Chartered Accountants registered to carry on audit in the UK by the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales. ________________________________ From: Carli Niemann <carli@troylabs.io> Sent: 28 February 2025 14:06 To: Naheeda Begum <naheeda@millet.org.uk>; Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io> Cc: Andrew Millet <andrew@millet.org.uk>; Snehil Kulshreshtha <Snehil@millet.org.uk> Subject: Re: Audit -General-2024 Hi Naheeda, Please see comments in blue inline below. Thanks, Carli From: Naheeda Begum <naheeda@millet.org.uk> Date: Sunday 16 February 2025 at 22:35 To: Carli Niemann <carli@troylabs.io> Cc: Andrew Millet <andrew@millet.org.uk>, Mert Deveci <mert@troylabs.io>, Snehil Kulshreshtha <Snehil@millet.org.uk> Subject: Audit -General-2024 Hi Carli, Hope you had a good weekend. Please provide the details or answer the below question: 1. Do you use any service organisation? If yes, can I please have a contract? No, not applicable 2. Are there any scrap assets? No, not applicable 3. Can you please provide a list of consultants and email addresses for the year 2023-2024? I have attached the list of consultants the company engaged with. Could you please advise why you require their email addresses? 4. Can you please pass the entry in XERO for share capital £0.30., which was agreed? I have now posted this entry on 1 April 2023 given the effective subscription date was on 22 Sep 22 5. Where are automated tools and techniques used to post JE? No 6. Any noncompliance with laws or regulations? No 7. Can you please provide the details of last correspondence from your legal advisor? We don’t have a designated legal advisor. We only contact legal advisors on an ad hoc basis as and when their services are required 8. Have you received any correspondence from HMRC or Companies House? Only standard reminders of tax payments due 9. Do you maintain data protection policies? @Mert Deveci<mailto:mert@troylabs.io> to advise on this point 10. Resignation letter, if any, available from SEKIP See attached Best regards, Naheeda Begum FCA Audit Supervisor Registered Auditors. Independent Examiners. messages.subject: Hi Mert : TenderBase Your Gateway to United Kingdom Tendering and Procurement Opportunities.
messages.snippet: Dear Mert, Greetings . I'm taking this opportunity to introduce you to TenderBase , a platform designed to help businesses like yours, to access and win Tendering opportunity in United Kingdom and
messages.body: Dear Mert, Greetings . I’m taking this opportunity to introduce you to TenderBase , a platform designed to help businesses like yours, to access and win Tendering opportunity in United Kingdom and Ireland through Domestic & Global Tenders, Projects, and Contract Awards &Business News. Activate your FREE Demo for 7 days Today and get access to following benefits. Do help us with your keywords and we will activate demo id for you . With over 10.3 million tender & 2 Million CA in our database, we empower companies to thrive in the industry. Our Services: 1. Tenders, EOIs, RFPs, and RFQs: Tailored opportunities in your industry. No limitations for keywords , geography or any lock for Alerts. 2. Contract Awards: Insights into market trends, key players, and winning bids. 3. Business Analytics and News: Stay ahead with real-time market intelligence. Value-Added Features: * Customized Alerts for tenders, proposals, and industry news. * Free Demo to explore our platform risk-free. * Global Reach with real-time updates on business opportunities. * Dedicate customer service executive to enhance your services. * User Friendly – Personnel Dashboard Understanding contract awards, procurement news, and global projects helps you analyse pricing strategies, identify potential partners, and plan effectively for future opportunities like RFPs and RFQs. For more details, visit here- www.tenderbase.co.uk or schedule a demo at your convenience. Looking forward to connecting with you. Warm regards, Lokesh Mishra Vice President - International Business Development [cid:2785e7ff-c71f-4bb0-9cc2-cdcdea733748] Linkedin<https://www.linkedin.com/company/tenderbase> | Facebook<https://www.facebook.com/tenderbase/> | X<https://twitter.com/tenderbaseUK> Your Comprehensive, Tender Search and Mangement Portal. Tenderbase Ltd., UK, Charles House, Denbigh Road, Basildon, Essex, SS15 6PY. Contact Us<https://tenderbase.co.uk/contact> | Privacy Policy<https://tenderbase.co.uk/privacy-policy> | About Us<https://tenderbase.co.uk/about-us> Copyright© Tenderbase All rights reserved.

messages.body: Hey Daria - wanted to reach out here as the credits will expire today. Happy to push that forward if you still need them. Also we are working on a sales inbox to uncover lost convos and check ins and also to monitor customers over time. This is a hypothesis of ours that it is a high priority problem in an AE’s work. Are we wrong? messages.subject: A Chat Bank
messages.snippet: Hey Tom - I believe you had the 10 year anniversary of founding Monzo last Monday, congrats! I am Mert, founder of Godmode from London. I am looking to start a new fintech company around answering one
messages.body: Hey Tom - I believe you had the 10 year anniversary of founding Monzo last Monday, congrats! I am Mert, founder of Godmode <http://godmodehq.com/> from London. I am looking to start a new fintech company around answering one question: How do you grow your net worth? Naming the project as Chat bank for now. I would love to apply for YC and beforehand grab your mind around fintech to learn from you. Would you be open for a 20 min chat soon? Here <https://calendly.com/mert-troylabs/talk-to-mert-troy-labs-cofounder> is my calendar if easier to book. I am happy to return the favour in any way that I can. Best, Mert

messages.snippet: Thank you, Hussein I have been regularly checking the e-mails that are being sent, and they are spot on and aligned with what Latona's does. Having said that, the below is an e-mail that went out
messages.body: Thank you, Hussein I have been regularly checking the e-mails that are being sent, and they are spot on and aligned with what Latona's does. Having said that, the below is an e-mail that went out this morning that does not communicate what we do accurately. I am not sure how anything can be tweaked to prevent the statement that we can help them with their hiring practices. from: Adam Beebe <adam@latonas.com> to: ishan@highlight.xyz date: Feb 27, 2025, 2:49 AM subject: Helping Highlight Grow mailed-by: latonas.com "I hope you’re doing well! I wanted to follow up on my last email about how Latona's can help Highlight tackle your talent acquisition challenges. As you continue transforming product testing, having the right tech talent is crucial. We specialize in connecting businesses like yours with skilled professionals, making your hiring process smoother and more effective. Would you be open to a brief call to discuss how we can assist you? I am here if ever I may assist you." Adam Beebe Business Development & Senior M&A Broker, Latona's "We broker established and profitable online businesses." Email: adam@latonas.com Skype: adam.latonas Phone: +1.787.303.4633 and +1.678.640.4530 Sign Up Here: https://latonas.com/accounts/signup/?utm_term=adambeebe About Us: https://latonas.com/credentials-deck/ https://latonas.com/podcast/ https://latonas.com/listings/sold/ Address: 207 Calle del Parque, Ste 10 San Juan, PR 00912 https://www.linkedin.com/in/adam-beebe-168a4b30/ Subscribe to our New Listings Newsletter:Buyers - Get Notified of New Listings "Latona’s is in the business of facilitating and assisting in mergers, acquisition and sales transactions involving privately held businesses and does not certify or verify the information provided by said businesses. messages.subject: Fwd: AI that actually learns?
messages.snippet: Perfect outbound email. Might be an interesting prod. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Daniel Kimber <daniel.kimber@openbrainfish.com> Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 3:04 PM Subject: AI
messages.body: Perfect outbound email. Might be an interesting prod. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Daniel Kimber <daniel.kimber@openbrainfish.com> Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 3:04 PM Subject: AI that actually learns? To: <hussein@godmodehq.com> Hi Hussein, Saw you're building the future of AI-native sales at GodmodeHQ - making outbound feel like inbound. That's exactly what caught my eye, because we're tackling a similar challenge in product support. While you're revolutionizing sales with AI, we're transforming product support with an ambient AI that actually learns from user behavior - no training or maintenance needed. Just a few lines of code and it starts understanding how users interact with your product. Companies like Smokeball saw their support NPS jump from 60 to 77 with a 92% successful self-service rate. Their support team now focuses on strategic work instead of repetitive questions. Want to see how it works? Thanks, Daniel

messages.body: Hey Felix, Thanks a lot for your feedback the other day! Just wanted to check in and let you know that I already added 100 credits to your account as promised. Also, we've taken your feedback into account for the next version of the onboarding flow. Looking forward to working more with you in the future!
